job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an Exam Developer, you coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in the various systems. In addition, you review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis. You work on all exams that form part of EXIN's certification portfolio.

   Importantly, you will collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes. You can translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms while maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes. You stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.

   Where you come in

   You are part of a committed team of Exam Developers, working in close cooperation with the Product Owner who ensures that the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market. You coordinate work with the Exam Developers and with small groups of international subject matter experts or third parties., * Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining exam products
     * Ensuring that deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, are within budget, and delivered on time
     * (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
     * Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
     * Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices and company policies
     * Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
     * Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
     * Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
     * Representing EXIN through attending (online) events
job_details.full_text:
Exam Developer

As an Exam Developer, you coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in the various systems. In addition, you review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis. You work on all exams that form part of EXIN's certification portfolio.

   Importantly, you will collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes. You can translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms while maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes. You stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.

   Where you come in

   You are part of a committed team of Exam Developers, working in close cooperation with the Product Owner who ensures that the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market. You coordinate work with the Exam Developers and with small groups of international subject matter experts or third parties., * Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining exam products
     * Ensuring that deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, are within budget, and delivered on time
     * (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
     * Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
     * Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices and company policies
     * Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
     * Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
     * Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
     * Representing EXIN through attending (online) events

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on exam development, localization, and quality assurance, with only a tangential mention of integrating generative AI. The core responsibilities do not align with the specialized tasks of an ML or GenAI Engineer.

phrases.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
phrases.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding the broader business context and ensuring technical work supports strategic objectives.

phrases.phrase: aligned with the needs of the market
phrases.justification: This indicates a need to understand market demands and translate them into product requirements.

phrases.phrase: translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: This involves understanding business or internal rules and converting them into a technical specification.

phrases.phrase: translate existing exams to several different languages
phrases.justification: While not traditional ML modeling, this involves transforming content from one format (language) to another, which can be seen as a form of data transformation.

phrases.phrase: implementing exam products in the various systems
phrases.justification: This involves integrating exam content into systems, which can involve data structuring and processing.

phrases.phrase: review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis
phrases.justification: Item and test analysis are statistical methods used to evaluate the performance of assessment items, which is a form of model evaluation.

phrases.phrase: integrate generative AI solutions into our processes
phrases.justification: This directly points to the use and integration of generative AI models.

phrases.phrase: machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: This explicitly mentions the development or use of machine learning algorithms.

phrases.phrase: maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes
phrases.justification: This involves ensuring the outputs of models meet specific standards and constraints.

phrases.phrase: Developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
phrases.justification: This involves creating and refining products based on specific measurement principles, which can involve algorithmic approaches.

phrases.phrase: Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
phrases.justification: This involves evaluating the quality and performance of the exam products, akin to model testing.

phrases.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: This is a direct statement about developing and managing ML algorithms.

phrases.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses
phrases.justification: Test analysis is a statistical method for evaluating exam quality, and root cause analysis is a problem-solving technique often applied to model performance issues.

phrases.phrase: implementing exam products in the various systems
phrases.justification: This involves integrating exam content into existing software systems, requiring software development skills.

phrases.phrase: building backend services
phrases.justification: Implied by the need to implement products in systems and maintain algorithms.

phrases.phrase: maintaining machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: This implies ongoing management and upkeep of algorithms in a production or semi-production environment.

phrases.phrase: resolving issues related to the exam products
phrases.justification: This involves troubleshooting and fixing problems, which is a core part of operations.

phrases.phrase: collaborate closely with the Exam Developers
phrases.justification: Directly indicates the need for teamwork and interaction with colleagues.

phrases.phrase: working in close cooperation with the Product Owner
phrases.justification: Highlights the importance of collaboration with product management.

phrases.phrase: coordinate work with the Exam Developers and with small groups of international subject matter experts or third parties
phrases.justification: Emphasizes coordination and communication across different groups and international stakeholders.

phrases.phrase: Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties
phrases.justification: Reinforces the need for strong coordination and cooperation skills with external parties.

phrases.phrase: Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions
phrases.justification: Requires clear communication to explain exam content to customers.

phrases.phrase: Representing EXIN through attending (online) events
phrases.justification: Implies communication and representation skills in external forums.

phrases.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning
phrases.justification: Directly states the need for continuous learning in a rapidly evolving field.

phrases.phrase: Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
phrases.justification: Indicates a requirement to stay current with knowledge in the relevant domain.

phrases.phrase: review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis
phrases.justification: Involves analytical skills to assess and improve exam quality.

phrases.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
phrases.justification: Highlights the ability to identify, diagnose, and fix problems.

phrases.phrase: (Co)developing and improving exam products
phrases.justification: Suggests an iterative approach to problem-solving and product enhancement.

phrases.phrase: maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes
phrases.justification: Directly addresses the need to adhere to legal, qualitative, and ethical standards.

phrases.phrase: complying with standards, best practices and company policies
phrases.justification: Indicates adherence to established rules and guidelines.

phrases.phrase: coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams
phrases.justification: Implies taking responsibility for the exam development process.

phrases.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: Suggests autonomy and taking ownership of the algorithm development lifecycle.

phrases.phrase: Ensuring that deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, are within budget, and delivered on time
phrases.justification: Demonstrates a focus on quality, efficiency, and timely delivery, indicating ownership.
